vote.title: Authorize the first of two, one-year renewal options to the service contract with Open Arms, Inc. dba Bryan’s House to provide childcare services for their special needs children through the Early Childhood and Out-of-School Time Services Program for the period of October 1, 2020 through September 30, 2021 - Not to exceed $50,000.00, from $50,000.00 to $100,000.00 - Financing:  2020-21 Community Development Block Grant Fund
vote.description: Authorize the first of two, one-year renewal options to the service contract with Open Arms, Inc. dba Bryan’s House to provide childcare services for their special needs children through the Early Childhood and Out-of-School Time Services Program for the period of October 1, 2020 through September 30, 2021 - Not to exceed $50,000.00, from $50,000.00 to $100,000.00 - Financing:  2020-21 Community Development Block Grant Fund
